sourcesContent:
<form (submit)="onsignup(addUser)" #addUser="ngForm">

    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredUsername"
    placeholder="Username"
    required
    minlength="1"
    #enteredUsername="ngModel"/>
    <!--pattern="^[a-zA-Z0-9\s_-]+$"-->

    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredPassword"
    placeholder="Password"
    required
    minlength="1"
    #enteredPassword="ngModel"/>
    <!--pattern="^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$"-->

    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredFirstname"
    placeholder="FirstName"
    required
    minlength="1"
    #enteredFirstname="ngModel"/>
    <!--pattern="^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$"-->

    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredLastname"
    placeholder="Lastname"
    required
    minlength="1"
    #enteredLastname="ngModel"/>
    <!--pattern="^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$"-->

    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredContact"
    placeholder="Contact"
    required
    minlength="1"
    #enteredContact="ngModel"/>
    <!--pattern="^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$"-->


    <button type="submit">Sign Up</button>

</form>
